name: Janitorium
description:
Made for the cool group PIGSquad's August Summer Slow Jam - Cliffhanger.

As a janitor, it's your job to keep things clean. Talk to office weirdos and use your mop and other tools to defeat garbage, demolish dirt and keep things sanitary. You've been called to your next job at a tech start-up and face your biggest mess yet . . .

Used the lovely dialogue engine, gossip, by @Brainfoam. :)
